plot: In the turmoil of the Russian Civil War of 1917-1921 a peasant girl Matushka wanders, as if mesmerized, into an abandoned country palace where her fate awaits her.
title: Matushka
plot_es: In the turmoil of the Russian Civil War of 1917-1921 a peasant girl Matushka wanders, as if mesmerized, into an abandoned country palace where her fate awaits her.
